name: tasty_trip_server
description: A robust Node.js backend server designed to fetch real-time restaurant and menu data from the Swiggy API. It serves as an intermediary layer, processing and securely exposing the data to a React-based frontend (FoodFire app), providing a seamless and efficient user experience. The server handles data caching, error handling, and optimized API calls to ensure fast and reliable communication between the client and Swiggyâ€™s API
